page.title: 18A SCHOOL DAY 1985.
page.content: EDUCATION HOMELIFE My name is Lizzie Thomas.I am 11 years old.Every morning I get up at 7.30.am.I have breakfast usually consisting of butter on toast.Toast is bread grilled till it goes crispy. Afterwards I go upstairs and clean my teeth with a toothbrush which is a piece of plastic with a little brush on the end.Then Mummy takes me in the car to school.We have a short playtime before we go into class.When we are in class our teacher Mrs Hunt takes the register,which is a list of our names. Then we have assembly. LIZZIE.
